definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: open eyes and (once) ears (NH id., open (and remove) rubbish heap, sq. [[עַל]] look to, attend to; Ar. faqah.a blossom, II. open eyes; JAram [[פְּקַח]] open eyes, etc.; Syr. pqah. blossom;—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: eyes of others Ge 21:19, 2Ki 6:17, 2Ki 6:17, 2Ki 6:20, 2Ki 6:20, Is 42:7, Ps 146:8; —for details v. [[עַיִן]]

definitions.title: 1 j. 2.
definitions.body: open ears = hear Is 42:20 (without understanding; fig. of Isr.).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְנִפְקְחוּ]] Ge 3:5; Impf. 3 fpl. [[תִּפָּקַחְנׇה]] Is 35:5, ´[[וַתּ]] Ge 3:7; —be opened, of eyes; fig., so as to know good and evil Ge 3:5, Ge 3:7; opp. blindness (fig.) Is 35:5.
